title: Dinwini be soma
lyrics:
Dinwini be soma -2
Khwmsi dorsi ni din,
githao-bathao be mulug-a
(A)
Bekheo nwngni megon khou,
naihor nwng be mugakhou -2
Bar hungka fwr baidi, bangrim fwr baidi
“Swrgwmbwgou honwi” -3  Swrgwmbwgou
(B)
Kalvari-ni Krushnifri,
swdwb mwnse honwi jabwgou -2
Tham-tim jadw hwnnanwi,
gwsw swlaidw hwnnanwi
“Swrgwmbwgou honwi” -3  Swrgwmbwgou
